means: 马杜克（古代巴比伦人的主神，原为巴比伦的太阳神）

sentence.Network_en: The temple of Bel - Marduk was being used by builders as a quarry.
sentence.Network_cn: 柏儿 ― 马杜克庙被建筑工人们用来作采石的场所.

sentence.Network_en: In theory the king was no more than an agent of Marduk.
sentence.Network_cn: 从理论上说,国王也只不过是太阳神马杜克的代言人.

sentence.Network_en: I to take a task, who knows where the mayor Marduk?
sentence.Network_cn: 我要接一个任务, 谁知道马杜克镇长在哪?
